quote.issuer_name: USAS Building System (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: USAS Building System (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: USAS Building System (Shanghai) Co Ltd is a China-based company primarily engaged in the provision of prefabricated steel structure building services. The Company mainly operates three businesses. The prefabricated steel structure building subcontracting services business includes project design and optimization, procurement, production, on-site installation, and quality assurance. The general contracting services business covers the entire project lifecycle, including project implementation, construction of primary structures, quality control, scheduling, safety, and budget management. The industrial environmental equipment business primarily focuses on the machinery filtering and acoustic systems (MFAS) line and air pollution control (APC) product line. The Company mainly conducts its businesses within domestic and overseas markets.
